titleStmt.title: To the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England, now sitting at Westminster a representation of the outrages and cruelties acted upon the servants of Christ, at two meetings at Sabridgworth in Hartford-shire.
titleStmt.author: Berd, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Robert Berd, Henry Stout, John Bresbon [and 11 others].
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
